name: Uncharted Waters Online
description: Discover yourself in the “Age of Discovery” where you’ll sail out into the uncharted waters! Discover real historical artifacts and mystical legends! Start a company and make enormous fortunes! Fight in fierce sea battles! Whatever your play style, you can play who you want and how you want in UWO!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2 or above Processor: CPU Pentium3-800MHz or above Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 800×600 or above, High Color display DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Window 7 / 2000 / XP / Vista Processor: Intel Dual Core / Intel i3 / AMD Phenom Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX560 / AMD HD7770 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 15 MB available space
